StarSystemImprovement.Name: StarSystemImprovementFood1
StarSystemImprovement.AIPathsPrerequisites: (($(ClassStarSystem:TargetedFoodSurplus) ge $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplus) and $(ClassStarSystem:Population) lt $(ClassStarSystem:MaxSystemPopulation)) or $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplusToProductionBonus) gt 0 or $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplus) lt 0) and ($(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeDesert,PlanetStatusColonized) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeArid,PlanetStatusColonized) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeArctic,PlanetStatusColonized) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeTundra,PlanetStatusColonized))

StarSystemImprovement.Name: StarSystemImprovementFood1Harmony
StarSystemImprovement.AIPathsPrerequisites: ((($(ClassStarSystem:TargetedFoodSurplus) ge $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplus) or ($(.../AffinityHarmony)) and $(ClassStarSystem:Population) lt $(ClassStarSystem:MaxSystemPopulation)) or $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplusToProductionBonus) gt 0 or $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplus) lt 0)

StarSystemImprovement.Name: StarSystemImprovementFood2
StarSystemImprovement.PathsPrerequisites: ($(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeTerran) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeJungle) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeOcean) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeArid) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeTundra) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeDesert) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeArctic))
StarSystemImprovement.ScrapPathsPrerequisites: ($(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeTerran) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeJungle) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeOcean) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeArid) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeTundra) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeDesert) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeArctic))
StarSystemImprovement.AIPathsPrerequisites: ((($(ClassStarSystem:TargetedFoodSurplus) ge $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplus) or ($(.../AffinityHarmony)) and $(ClassStarSystem:Population) lt $(ClassStarSystem:MaxSystemPopulation)) or $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplusToProductionBonus) gt 0 or $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplus) lt 0) and ($(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeTerran,PlanetStatusColonized) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeJungle,PlanetStatusColonized) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeOcean,PlanetStatusColonized) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeArid,PlanetStatusColonized) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeTundra,PlanetStatusColonized) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeDesert,PlanetStatusColonized) or $(ClassStarSystem/PlanetTypeArctic,PlanetStatusColonized))

StarSystemImprovement.Name: StarSystemImprovementFood3
StarSystemImprovement.AIPathsPrerequisites: ((($(ClassStarSystem:TargetedFoodSurplus) ge $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplus) or ($(.../AffinityHarmony)) and $(ClassStarSystem:Population) lt $(ClassStarSystem:MaxSystemPopulation)) or $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplusToProductionBonus) gt 0 or $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplus) lt 0) and $(ClassStarSystem/ClassPlanet/MoonStatusExplored)

StarSystemImprovement.Name: StarSystemImprovementFood3Sower
StarSystemImprovement.AIPathsPrerequisites: ((($(ClassStarSystem:TargetedFoodSurplus) ge $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplus) or ($(.../AffinityHarmony)) and $(ClassStarSystem:Population) lt $(ClassStarSystem:MaxSystemPopulation) or $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplusToProductionBonus) gt 0 or $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplus) lt 0) and $(ClassStarSystem/ClassPlanet/MoonStatusExplored)) or $(ClassStarSystem/ClassPlanet/MoonStatusExploredWithTemple)

StarSystemImprovement.Name: StarSystemImprovementFood4
StarSystemImprovement.AIPathsPrerequisites: ((($(ClassStarSystem:TargetedFoodSurplus) ge $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplus) or ($(.../AffinityHarmony)) and $(ClassStarSystem:Population) lt $(ClassStarSystem:MaxSystemPopulation)) or $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplusToProductionBonus) gt 0 or $(ClassStarSystem:FoodSurplus) lt 0)
